extension-param.param-value: style:#site-translate-header-wrapper{width:100% !important; height:44px; position: fixed; top:0;}#site-translate-header-wrapper p{font-size:10px;line-height: 12px;}#site-translate-message{display:table-cell; height:44px; vertical-align:middle; width:5000px;} header {margin: 48px auto 0;} .band__link:after {left: unset;} .band {margin-top: 44px;} .menubar_wrapper {z-index: 999;} .menubar_wrapper.open {padding-top: 0;}
